description: Numbers which are the fourth powers of their digit sum.
comments: It can be shown that 1679616 = 36^4 is the largest such number.
references: Amarnath Murthy, The largest and the smallest m-th power whose digit sum is the m-th root. (To be published)
crossrefs: Cf. A046000, A076090, A046017; A252648 and references there.
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 21 2001
extensions: Initial 0 added by _M. F. Hasler_, Apr 12 2015
